task.summary: Default task

Refactor image cropper to use Clickable and implement ClipOval
Updated the image cropper component in the Flutter project to use the Clickable widget instead of InkWell for better responsiveness and interaction. Additionally, moved the ClipOval widget to a lower level in the widget tree to enhance rendering performance and clipping precision.

Reorder parameters in Clickable component for better usability
Modified the Clickable component by moving the onPressed parameter to the first position and the child parameter to the last. This change improves the readability and usability of the component, aligning with common Flutter practices for widget constructors.

Switch from Set to List for selected weekdays in WeekdayPicker
Updated the WeekdayPicker component to use a List instead of a Set for managing selected weekdays. This change facilitates ordered access and manipulation of selected days, enhancing functionality where the order of days is significant.

Add and make serializable key models in domain and data layers
Introduced essential models in both the domain and data layers, enhancing the project's structure and data handling capabilities. Each model is made JSON serializable to ensure seamless serialization and deserialization processes, facilitating efficient data exchange and persistence.

Add and make serializable key models in domain and data layers
Introduced essential models in both the domain and data layers, enhancing the project's structure and data handling capabilities. Each model is made JSON serializable to ensure seamless serialization and deserialization processes, facilitating efficient data exchange and persistence.

Integrate getIt and set up AppModule with Dio client for dev API
Implemented the getIt library for dependency injection and created an AppModule that includes a configured Dio client. This client is set with the development API base URL, ensuring all network requests are correctly directed during the development phase.

Implement and integrate EditEvent and Event screens with backend
Added functionality to the EditEvent and Event screens, including UI elements and interaction logic.

Add clearToken method to TokenPreferencesManager and implement in Impl
Introduced a clearToken method to the TokenPreferencesManager interface and provided its implementation in TokenPreferencesManagerImpl. This new functionality allows for securely clearing authentication tokens from preferences.
Fix 307 exception on login
Fix create event issue
include generated dto files in git

Fix create event issues + event screen

Write fromJson function for all enums

Fix some typo issues with API integration + attendance_screen.dart

refactor: remove unused dependencies from pubspec.yaml
This commit cleans up the pubspec.yaml file by removing dependencies that are no longer used in the project. This change simplifies dependency management and potentially improves app performance and build times.

feat: enhance Calendar screen with new functionality and UI improvements
- Rename 'MitCalendarScreen' to 'CalendarScreen' to align with naming conventions. - Implement functionality to fetch sessions dynamically when the calendar page changes. This addition improves user experience by ensuring that the calendar displays up-to-date session information. - Add a loading overlay during session fetching to block user interactions temporarily. This prevents any potential issues arising from user actions during data loading and enhances the UI responsiveness.
These changes make the Calendar screen more intuitive and user-friendly by providing real-time updates and maintaining a smooth interaction flow.
fix: address bugs in custom repeat functionalities
feat: Display 'All Day' on session cards for full-day events
feat: Add live counter to track attendance status in real-time
feat: Add live counter to track attendance status in real-time
Upgrade dependencies to enhance app functionality
Update base URL to point to production servers
Add AppAvatar component for reusable avatar widgets
Add necessary ProGuard rules for Android build optimization
Fix clickability and feedback visibility issues in session cards
Update app card to use surface color
Add ContainerButton component using primary container color for app-wide reuse
Implement AppAvatar component in profile screen

Enforce 50-character limit on event name and remove counter from text field
This commit introduces a maximum length restriction of 50 characters for event names to prevent excessively long entries. Additionally, it removes the character counter from the associated text field

Rename builder function for consistency
This commit updates the naming of the builder function to align with our naming conventions, enhancing code readability and maintainability
Rename builder functions for consistency

Refactor updateContent to support pull-to-refresh and return Future<void>
This commit modifies the updateContent function to refresh its content and changes its return type to Future<void>. These changes are necessary to implement the pull-to-refresh feature.

Update app title to 'Kidventory' and introduce new surface color
This commit changes the application's title from 'Demo App' to 'Kidventory' to reflect its branding and purpose more accurately

Implement expandable floating action button component
This commit introduces a new expandable floating action button component to enhance the application's interactive capabilities. The component is designed to offer additional action options upon user interaction, improving user experience and accessibility.

Create ShimmerBorder and ShimmerBox components for shimmer loading effect
This commit adds two new components, ShimmerBorder and ShimmerBox, designed to implement shimmer loading effects.

Implement Session Cards Loading component
This commit introduces the Session Cards Loading component to provide visual indicators when session data is being loaded.

Implement Create Group screen
This commit introduces the Create Group screen
Fix the gray screen issue

MESSAGE.value: Fix discovered issues

refactor: remove unused dependencies from pubspec.yaml
This commit cleans up the pubspec.yaml file by removing dependencies that are no longer used in the project. This change simplifies dependency management and potentially improves app performance and build times.

fix: correct serialization logic for 'repeat unit' field
This commit resolves an issue where the 'repeat unit' field was not correctly serializing to its corresponding integer value and vice versa. Specifically, 'month' now correctly serializes to '3', and '3' deserializes back to 'month'.

feat: enhance Calendar screen with new functionality and UI improvements
- Rename 'MitCalendarScreen' to 'CalendarScreen' to align with naming conventions. - Implement functionality to fetch sessions dynamically when the calendar page changes. This addition improves user experience by ensuring that the calendar displays up-to-date session information. - Add a loading overlay during session fetching to block user interactions temporarily. This prevents any potential issues arising from user actions during data loading and enhances the UI responsiveness.
These changes make the Calendar screen more intuitive and user-friendly by providing real-time updates and maintaining a smooth interaction flow.

feat: Add live counter to track attendance status in real-time
